languages.text: "Чего ты радуешься? Все только хуже стало! Теперь бьют больнее и чаще".
"What are you so gleeful for? It's only gotten worse! The beatings come harder and faster now."
languages.original_text: "Чего ты радуешься? Все только хуже стало! Теперь бьют больнее и чаще".

traits.locale_text: "What's there to gloat over? It's only got worse! Now the beatings are more frequent and more painful."
"What's there to gloat over? It's only got worse! Now the beatings are more frequent and more painful."
"What are you so gleeful for? It's only gotten worse! The beatings come harder and faster now."
"What are you so gleeful for? It's only gotten worse! The beatings come harder and faster now."
"What are you so gleeful for? It's only gotten worse! The beatings come harder and faster now."
"What are you so gleeful for? It's only gotten worse! The beatings come harder and faster now."

languages.text: «¿De qué te alegras tú? ¡Si esto no ha hecho más que empeorar! Ahora las palizas son más duras y frecuentes».
languages.original_text: "What are you so gleeful for? It's only gotten worse! The beatings come harder and faster now."

traits.locale_text: «¿De qué te alegras tú? ¡Si esto no ha hecho más que empeorar! Ahora las palizas son más duras y frecuentes».

languages.text: 「何をそんなに浮かれているんだ？悪くなる一方じゃないか！暴行は激しさと勢いを増している」
languages.original_text: "What are you so gleeful for? It's only gotten worse! The beatings come harder and faster now."

traits.locale_text: 「何をそんなに浮かれているんだ？悪くなる一方じゃないか！暴行は激しさと勢いを増している」

languages.text: “这有什么可高兴的？情况变得比以前还糟糕！那些人打起人来比以前还狠，下手也更快了。”
languages.original_text: "What are you so gleeful for? It's only gotten worse! The beatings come harder and faster now."

traits.locale_text: “这有什么可高兴的？情况变得比以前还糟糕！那些人打起人来比以前还狠，下手也更快了。”

languages.text: "Was seid Ihr denn so fröhlich? Es ist doch nur schlimmer geworden! Sie schlagen uns jetzt härter und häufiger."
languages.original_text: "What are you so gleeful for? It's only gotten worse! The beatings come harder and faster now."

traits.locale_text: "Was seid Ihr denn so fröhlich? Es ist doch nur schlimmer geworden! Sie schlagen uns jetzt härter und häufiger."

languages.text: « Pourquoi vous jubilez comme ça ? La situation n'a fait qu'empirer ! Maintenant, ils tapent encore plus vite et plus fort. »
languages.original_text: "What are you so gleeful for? It's only gotten worse! The beatings come harder and faster now."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi vous jubilez comme ça ? La situation n'a fait qu'empirer ! Maintenant, ils tapent encore plus vite et plus fort. »

languages.text: "Sen niye öyle neşelisin? Her şey daha da kötü oldu! Şimdi dayakları daha sert ve daha çabuk atıyorlar."
languages.original_text: "What are you so gleeful for? It's only gotten worse! The beatings come harder and faster now."
